titles.title: The Greatest Thing In All My Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The greatest thing in all my life Is loving You. (repeat) I want to love You more. I want to love You more. The greatest thing in all my life Is loving You. The greatest thing in all my life Is knowing You. (repeat) I want to know You more. I want to know You more. The greatest thing in all my life Is knowing You. The greatest thing in all my life Is serving You. (repeat) I want to serve You more. I want to serve You more. The greatest thing in all my life Is serving You.{/lang-eng}
